reviews.review_text: This helped me Achieved what I wanted . It brightened my dull hair color. I recommend using this product for your hair color. It brightens the blonde color.

reviews.title: Best ever
reviews.review_text: This is the best product out there. Takes away all brassiness.and brightens your hair. And just one shampoo.

reviews.title: Works Good
reviews.review_text: Shampoo works to take brassiness out of my hair and leaves it soft and smelling good. I was looking for a shampoo to tone it silvery but this isn't strong enough, but that was my mistake. It works for what it is intended

reviews.title: Favorite Affordable Toning Shampoo
reviews.review_text: Best affordable purple shampoo I've used, I'm brunette with chunky blonde highlights and this keeps them bright despite only getting touch-ups twice a year.
This takes out the dullness in my highlights without making my hair a purple/grayish color! This is definitely my go to shampoo to perk up my highlights.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: Not only does this shampoo and conditioner, set brighten your blonde, and/or gray hairs, it also makes your hair so soft. It did a lot of repair to my hair after over Processing. I love this stuff!

I like the feel of this product. I'm not convinced that it actually does anything for the brassy tones, but I use it a couple times a week in conjunction with my regular hair products. Would recommend in general.

I like this when im on a budget it fies the job. It leaves your hsir clean i just dont feel it tones it the way other purple shampos ive used the same. I dont feel like my gold is disappearing or toning. otger than that it works it smells good its budget friendly. So if you cant afford your favorite purple shampoo id pick this one next.

reviews.title: NOT Purple or Moisture.
reviews.review_text: NOT Purple, for gray or blonde hair to brighten and remove brassiness. At best, it's a soft lavender. NO Moisturizing texture. Very Disappointed as i typically like this brand.

reviews.title: Hate it
reviews.review_text: Have used JF for years but hate this stuff. My hair was shiny and bright until I used this. Now it's a lot darker and dull looking. Would never buy it again. Love Highlight Activating.

Love how this purple shampoo brightens my blond hair and smells delicious often getting complements.. was given a previous incarnation of purple freida shampoo in 2000, loved it and was so excited when you came out with new violet shampoo %26 conditioner.

i usually love all of John Frieda products. they e always worked great. ive been in the process now of turning my hair a snow white its still blonde not fully white yet used this product and on the first time instead of it helping my hair it has ruined it my hair in spots now looks lavender not blonde. rinsed it out till the water was clear. love John Frieda products still but would bot recommend this product for blonde hair u less you want it to have a light lavender tinit in spots.
I think it's working, I think I should have went to a bleach blonder shade of hair color

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.review_text: Great shampoo. Just don't overuse. Hair will turn purple or gray.
Received two shampoos I thought I was getting one shampoo and one conditioner?

reviews.title: It works.
reviews.review_text: This is the best shampoo I have found for keeping the brassy shades out of my highlighted hair.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: Turns my brassy hair to a nice silver shine
I love everything about the product for blonde hair.
i did not notice any improvement after use color wise but definitely hair was dryed out like stripped - way too harsh on hair
my wife has been using for a while now, but Walmart no longer has on the shelf in the store. I'm not sure where she's gonna get it.
my wife been using it for a while now. Walmart has taken it off their shelves, so I'm not sure if they are discontinued or only available online now.
I use this every other wash to keep my blond from getting brassy.

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review_text: Only used it once, but it did shiny up my blond and white hair.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: Best purple shampoo out there. Pricey, but if you want quality this is it.

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: This shampoo works great for my highlighted hair.
it does what it claims to do, and my hair isn't dried out by it. and the price is great! I'll buy this again!
Love it works as well as other purple shampoos but my sensitive skin caused my head to break out with the scent in this.
Does stain hands if you keep it on for too long but very good at getting rid of the annoying yellow tones so it's worth it
Love this conditioner ! It's a deep conditioner somewhat like the conditioner that comes with hair dye!

reviews.title: Helps keep my blonde bright!
reviews.review_text: Your light hair needs this! I'm using the shampoo as well, and my hair is very soft, and the color stays bright.

reviews.title: Purple Mess
reviews.review_text: The shampoo smells great, lathers nice and fluffy, made my hair look great. The only problem I have is the purple bubbles left behind in the white tub. You have to rinse the tub right after getting out or it will turn purple.

reviews.title: Always happy with his products.
reviews.review_text: Another great product from John Freida at an affordable price.

reviews.title: Pretty good not the greatest
reviews.review_text: Took out some of the brassiness but not enough to make it look blonde blonde again.
Works wonderfully when my highlights need brightened!

reviews.title: Citrus free
reviews.review_text: I'm allergic to Citrus, thanks for giving me options

reviews.title: Never again
reviews.review_text: My hair feels super dry and yucky after I use this will not purchase again
I love the color of the shampoo. it keeps my blond hair blond. I absolutely love the conditioner.
lathers more than other purple shampoo/conditioner ðŸ’œ and has a pretty scent.

reviews.title: The Best I've Used
reviews.review_text: Live this product. Rich and nourishing.
I love this! It's the only brand I buy- love the mousse, shampoo and conditioner!!

reviews.title: It works the best!
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING. My hair is a dark brown with red undertones, and I needed this because I had to bleach my hair in order to switch to a nice blue. Within 2 washes.. no joke, it took the orange away. This thing is HIGHLY pigmented, so watch your countertops and scrub off any surfaces immediately.

reviews.title: Deep dark purple
reviews.review_text: Leave it in for 3 minutes. I used it three times a week, and it completely corrected all the brassiness after just two weeks. I was skeptical about this brand as it was one of the less expensive, but it works the best. I naturally have medium to dark blonde hair and I dye my hair light blonde and sometimes it gets brassy, but this will fix it.

reviews.title: NOT AS "WOW" AS THE NAME OF PRODUCT
reviews.review_text: The name on the product made me think "Violet Crush Purple" would be better than the brand I usually use but it wasn't. There was no WOW factor it was just purple cream rinse. Didn't calm brassiness or like my usual brand made it less brassy and also made the blonde more vivacious. This did none of that. Really disappointed and I don't recommend it.

reviews.title: Very good product!
reviews.review_text: I was very skeptical about this shampoo. I honestly didn't think it would tone my hair at all. I was pleasantly surprised. This toned my hair from a brassy/yellow fresh bleached lookâ€¦yuck..to a nice silver platinum. I would recommend using an actual toner to tone hair, but in a pinch and for maintaining color in between colorings, this is perfect. It has violet..which is purple/blue and it cancels the yellows and the oranges in bleached hair. I would recommend this for sure. Side note: this product smells SOOOOO good.

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I had just gotten my hair done and there was a little brassiness near my roots, where my hair is the darkest. Long story shortâ€¦ it did absolutely nothing at all for the brassiness but instead turned the whole rest of my head an ugly drab grayish white! Before using my hair was a blond pretty color. I will definitely not use it again, I'm just hoping it will wash out when I wash my hair next time. I've never had this happen with any other brand of purple shampoo. I definitely do not recommend this product. Mine is going in the garage, what a waste of money.

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many purple shampoos. I have naturally dark hair that is bleached to a level 9.5, with some lowlights that are probably a level 8, which are brassy. 1 use of this shampoo, and I could tell a difference! Even with wet hair in the shower, as soon as I rinsed, I was audibly shocked. It's easily the best purple shampoo I've used. Its a bit drying on hair but not much and some conditoner to follow solves this. I have literally nothing negative to say. I love my hair color since I've started using this.

reviews.title: Another great product from John Frieda
reviews.review_text: Works on the first try Exactly as it says and leaves hair feeling soft

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of my top favorite purple shampoos

reviews.title: so so
reviews.review_text: its nothing special its like so many others it just takes out the tangles.

reviews.title: Skip this
reviews.review_text: Product did not help at all. You're better spending a little more on a different product
Had been trying to find, and there it was, and am using a quality product.

reviews.title: Item was missing from order
reviews.review_text: It was missing from order altho i paid for it

reviews.title: DOES THE JOB
reviews.review_text: The only purple shampoo I've found that does its job!

reviews.title: Luxurious
reviews.review_text: Love scent and brightness softness of hair often getting complements on smell
turn hands purple and have to wash very hard to get off

reviews.title: Best purple shampoo ever!
reviews.review_text: This is the best shampoo for blonde platinum hair and doesn't have a bad odor like a lot of purple shampoos do. Just takes a small amount for a good lather.

reviews.title: Unhappy but its just one of those things.
reviews.review_text: I thought this was supposed to be a purple depositing shampoo. Which is what the label led me to believe? And I now I have an expensive bottle of shampoo for blondes that I cannot use.
No more brassy hair but it turned my white hair lavender! I washed my hair as usual %26 rinsed in cool water but still ended up with lavender streaks! Good thing I am retired!
Packaging needs help. This shampoo has purple dye in it. Cap leaks and I have a dye spot in my shower that won't go away. That's what the product is supposed to do...on hair.... not showers.

reviews.title: works great
reviews.review_text: I had lightened my hair, it came out a little more yellow than I like. I used this a few times (allow it to sit for a few minutes) and it removed the brassiness.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: This shampoo made my hair dry like a haystack. I had nothing but static the next day. It made my strands so dry which made them break more easily. I will NOT be using this again. $11 literally down the drain.

reviews.title: It's good
reviews.review_text: Great product for colored hair. I have blue and purple in my hair and it works great to keep the color intact.

reviews.title: Best purple shampoo ever!!!
reviews.review_text: I've tried just about every purple shampoo out there and this is the best! You can really see the difference in one wash.

reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
reviews.review_text: I have very hard water that turns my blonde brassy I hate it. I tried a few different brands %26 this one is the best!! I love it!!
I wouldn't say immediate results but it did tone the hair a little bit. I made sure to leave it on for several minutes.

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.review_text: works really well! i wash my hair and let it sit for about 3 minutes and rinse out. when i get out of the shower the brassiness is gone!

reviews.title: I like this conditioner a lot!
reviews.review_text: I don't color my hair and I don't like the dark hair in my blonde. This conditioner is great for lightening the blonde.
This absolutely took all of the brassiness out of my recently bleached hair. My hair is so soft and smells wonderful!
Love it, takes the brassiness out just like that. your hair looks like you just came out of a salon !

reviews.title: Shiny, soft hair
reviews.review_text: I use John Frieda shampoo and conditioner for my dyed hair to give me a lighter blond color. The conditioner leaves my hair soft and shiny.

reviews.title: No need
reviews.review_text: Not needed. No need to buy purple conditioner. Shampoo works to tone. Conditioner is just to moisturize, your regular conditioner should do that.

reviews.title: Silver Highlights
reviews.review_text: I like the texture very thick, smells great conditions hair no knots, and it makes gray hair shine silver!

reviews.title: highly recommend
reviews.review_text: Iv used other purple shampoos and then i tried John Frieda Violet Crush hands down John Frieda made my blonde highlights brighter!

reviews.title: Works
reviews.review_text: Works in one wash! Your hair is changed in 2 washes . Ignore others reviews. It will dry hair out tho, as will all purple shampoos
Love this shampoo! It helps eliminate the brassy tones that develop. I have thin hair and it doesn't dry or weight down my hair.

reviews.title: Exactly what my hair needed
reviews.review_text: I have lightened and colored my hair for many years and after a few weeks each time, my hair starts to look dull. This product brightened it after a few washes and I will continue to use it. I wish a hairspray for blonde hair was available as well. The shampoo is kind of expensive but it doesn't take much to make a nice lather.
